title: Authors and Citation
text: Winskill P (2024). boostr: Package (Title Case). R package version 0.1.0, https://mrc-ide.github.io/boostr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {boostr: What the Package Does (Title Case)},   author = {Pete Winskill},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://mrc-ide.github.io/boostr/}, }

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: generic implementation combined vaccine vaccine efficacy modelling framework first proposed White et al (2015). Please cite work use vaccine model. model consists two parts. first predicts antibody titres time following initital dose(s) subsequent booster doses. titre(t)=titredose(ρdosee−rdoses(t−tdose)+(1−ρdose)e−rdosel(t−tdose)) titre(t) = titre_{dose} \left( \rho_{dose} e^{-r_{dose}^s (t - t_{dose})} + (1 - \rho_{dose}) e^{-r_{dose}^l (t - t_{dose})} \right) subscript dosedose indexes primary series dose(s) subsequent booster doses, titretitre maximum titre receipt dose booster, rhorho proportion response short-lived rs=loge(2)dsr^s = \frac{\log_e(2)}{d^s} rl=loge(2)dlr^l = \frac{\log_e(2)}{d^l} dsd^s dld^l half-lives short long lived components antibody response respectively. second translates antibody titre vaccine efficacy using parameterised dose response curve. V(t)=Vmax(1−11+(titre(t)β)α) V(t) = V_{max} \left( 1 - \frac{1}{1 + \left( \frac{titre(t)}{\beta} \right)^\alpha } \right) VmaxV_{max} maximum vaccine efficacy, alphaalpha shape parameter betabeta scale parameter

title: Estimate antibody titres — ab
code: ab(   timesteps,   dose_timesteps,   init_titres,   prop_short,   dur_short,   dur_long,   cpp = TRUE )

title: Estimate antibody titres — ab
text: timesteps Number timesteps output titres dose_timesteps Timesteps doses init_titres Titres initital subsequent boost times prop_short Proportion response short lived dose period dur_short Duration short-lived response dose period dur_long Duration long-lived response dose period cpp Use cpp titre model

title: boostr: What the Package Does (Title Case) — boostr-package
Estimate vaccine efficacy — efficacy
code: efficacy(titre, max_efficacy, alpha, beta, cpp = TRUE)

title: Estimate vaccine efficacy — efficacy
text: titre Vector antibody titres max_efficacy Maximum vaccine efficacy alpha Shape parameter beta Scale parameter cpp Use cpp efficacy model
